title: Good holiday location
desc: The pool upstairs is very nice.we had a lovely time there as family.kids enjoyed the kids menu there.Food served was great.want to go once again to the same location. Memorable place.good place to hangout.

title: Excellent service
desc: Daniel service was excellent and me and my girlfriend throughly enjoyed the time here, we were totally surprised with his attentiveness towards his guests and we even gotten a complimentary cake for our anniversary celebration at Lantern! We had a great time at Lantern and we are glad to be serviced by your staff, Daniel! He really showed us an extraordinary service that one should have. Big shout out to Daniel and please do give him a good promotion as he definitely deserves it! Thank you for the great experience here, will definitely be back!

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Excellent hotel! We stayed only for 1 night as a birthday celebration. We were welcomed with a balloon and a birthday gift! We got our room much earlier than expected, at 10am instead of the usual 3pm. The room was super clean. The staff is the nicest. The pool on the roof is superb and the breakfast has lots of options and excellent food, and many choices for all dietary needs. We will be back for sure

title: Amazing Hotel‚Ä¶. Not to be missed
desc: We were in transit from Langkawi, and decided to stay for 2 nights. To be honest wish we had stayed longer ! We stayed at Marina Bay Sands last time and hated it. FB was outstanding, our room was stunning and very comfortable to say the least. We had views onto the Bay, with a fab balcony as well. The bed was so comfortable, and all the facilities were as expected. We did have a ‚Äúhick up ‚Äú during dinner which was resolved admirably. We had drinks on the Roof Top bar which was lovely, we did go before when we were at MBS . We went over to Raffles for dinner which was good as well. I would like to point out that the staff and service at FB was superb to say the least. Nothing was too much trouble will definitely stay again. Such a great location to walk to the amazing shopping

title: Great!!!
desc: Very friendly and helpful service. Thanks for borrowing the lighter for me to blow the candle haha. And he did take care of us. Help us take nicely picture and approached us if we anything else. Overall I like the service and I did enjoy here

title: Must visit
desc: Great view. Awesome cocktails. Exceptional service from Loges, he was a legend. My friend and I were seated promptly even though they were busy. We ordered margaritas, one of the best in Singapore. Will return for sure.

title: This must be the best hotel in the world just go and stay you will love it
desc: This is not a 5 star Hotel it is a 10 star hotel lovely spotless all staff are very friendly and say hello the lobby and chandlers are amazing we were teated like king and queen for the 2 nights and we will save up and stay again as soon as possible the light show was lovely from our own decking. Thank you so much the Cliffords

title: I love Lantern
desc: The Lantern‚Äôs food and view makes me happy!! Especially Loges gives us great service :) so my sister‚Äôs bithday could be wonderful! Thank you sooo much! Anybody who travels Singapore must visit here to enjoy great view and great slings

title: Beautiful hotel with poor service
desc: The hotel is modern and stunning in a terrific waterfront setting. The rooms are immaculate and very comfortable. Breakfast and lunch were very good. Now, the big negative‚Äîservice. Check in and check out were long and disorganized. It took several attempts for the man at reception to explain our bill in a clear manner. Requests for items were either ignored or delayed. For the price, unacceptable. Next time will try the Ritz where I hear service is great.

title: 8 Nights in Singapore
desc: Wow, what an absolutely beautiful hotel, right on the water in Marina Bay. With the most wonderful attention given to every detail, The Fullerton Bay Hotel must be considered one of the finest hotels in Singapore. Beautifully curated interiors with a sympathetic nod to the cultural heritage of the Island, combine with discrete but charming staff to offer a really relaxing and luxurious experience. From the tropical oasis of the roof top pool to a complimentary waking tour of the Colonial District of Singapore, every effort has been made to make your stay memorable. We will definitely be back.

title: Five-star property, three-star service
desc: I wanted so much to give this hotel 5 stars, butI just couldn‚Äôt. The positive is that the property is beautiful and impeccably kept. The food at the restaurants we went to was excellent. The negative was the service. We had to call three times to the front desk to get a pair of scissors we needed. Other requests made from the room took too long to complete for a five-star hotel. Additionally, the check-in and check-out took inordinately long and was quite unnecessary. title: Great place to hang out with friends
desc: Excellent service from Lotha and Kate! Food delicious and so pretty. But when we almost done, there is a housefly joining our party. We couldn‚Äôt finish our food but was able to pack them home. We have a great time! Thank you.

title: Golden hour rooftop drinks
desc: Great early evening drinks on the rooftop. The Fullerton Bay Hotel Singapore Bar Staff were first Class. Efficient, attentive. Location and the staff made for a very memorable sunset! Cheese Platter and drinks didn't disappoint!

title: Thanks Fullerton Bay, Thanks to Lyca :)
desc: It was the best hotel I've ever experienced! Thank you again for the kindness and consideration of hotelier Lyca.She tried everything to make us feel comfortable.If I go to Singapore, I want to again.

title: Wonderful evening at Lantern
desc: Came to lantern for drinks and had the most wonderful evening. Came with my parents who were visiting Singapore, and Loges was very attentive and welcoming. Delicious cocktails and lovely service - thank you!

title: Celebrating Silver Anniversary with Style
desc: We had a fantastic stay at the Fullerton Bay Hotel. Inquiries and requests prior to booking were promptly replied to and arranged. We were greeted by a sweet surprise at our room upon check-in for our silver anniversary. The view was spectacular, our room offered a view of the Marina Bay, which I couldn't get enough of, especially when the day was breaking. We appreciate the special attention and care from Nicolas Wong, Namiko, Ali and their teams - in fact from every staff of the hotel!! We were always met with smiles wherever we turned to and were offered help in every way they could. The concierge team was full of good advice that we followed and enjoyed, especially when it came to food. Every request, big or small, was met. We didn't get to enjoy the afternoon tea

title: BRILLIANT!
desc: Simply superb! A truly wonderful experience, lovely staff, beautiful food and the room was fabulous. Thank you for a terrific stay, will definitely return on our next visit to Singapore. Highly recommend.

title: Guest relations, Namiko and her team!
desc: Perfect attention from Namiko and her team!! It was so detailed and kind! They were all up to date of our trip and helped in every way they could! The late check out was so much help and made our trip back home way more soothing! Thank you Namiko and Fullerton Bay hotel for the amazing trip. Hope to see you soon!

title: Fantastic stay, incredible hotel
desc: We were met with a smile at the door, a cold face cloth and refreshing drink during check in. We were escorted to our room and shown where everything was, then left to enjoy‚Ä¶. And WOW The views were incredible! We were in corner room 318 and this offered a view over Custom House as well as the Marina Bay Sands, with an open balcony to sit outside and watch the light show. As it was our honeymoon, the staff had prepared our room with a lovely surprise, balloons, teddy bears, wine, fruit and macaroons, scattered with fresh rose petals and two welcome cards! Very sweet! Breakfast was super, fresh, plenty of choice and a lovely atmosphere. We enjoyed the roof top bar, which can get busy with non- residents, but they always found us a spot without needing a reservation. Gym

title: IT was great experience
desc: The hotel service was excellent, and the hotel managers were all very friendly. Especially, Manager Luna made sure we could enjoy the restaurant service comfortably and provided top-notch service for guests from beginning to end. Our companions were also satisfied with the hotel and the managers' service, and we plan to stay at the Fullerton Bay Hotel again when we visit Singapore in the future.

title: Incredible friendly service with an amazing view
desc: Thank you Najib, Germa and the Fullerton Bay Hotel for an incredible experience and service!! We had a work function with over 30 doctors and you went above and beyond to make it special! An evening we won‚Äôt forget!

title: Great view and service
desc: The staff over here was very nice, Asel, Lanq, Preethq, Tosephine and Kate. They tried to do their best. Also the view from here was very nice. I saw fireworks with Marina Bay Sands. Maybe that was because before establishing day.

title: A beautiful Hotel
desc: We stayed here for a few days whilst on our way home from our European vacation. Our room was ready when we checked in at 6am after our long flight from London. Very clean and staff very attentive. Great location and we will be back

title: Friendly staff, good atmosphere
desc: Kylar was very friendly and thanks to her, we enjoyed tonight!‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è We will come this place for sure cos the view here was amazing!! Highly recommended bar in Singapore with MBS view, drink was also fulfilling

title: Lovely hotel, great service
desc: Lovely hotel with great service. The staff were very professional and the rooms were lovely. Breakfast buffet was small in comparison to some Singapore hotels but it was a quality offering with more than enough to choose from

title: A classic, luxury hotel with a modern twist.
desc: A classic. Lots of personal touches, but it‚Äôs starting to need a refresh in the accommodation areas. The Fullerton Bay Hotel has been our go to, trusted favourite, since we first visited in 2015. It‚Äôs hard to stay anywhere else in Singapore as the location, service, public decor and overall stay quality is great. However, the rooms are now dating a little and the service level has dropped from its exceptionally high standard pre-Covid. A small refresh of carpets and decor in the rooms would bring it back to top shape. Front desk, concierge and arrival services are flawless but food and beverage needs to be tighter and breakfast service specifically needs to be better. Again, a strong comparison from pre-Covid is what let it down for us. It felt a bit chaotic and less well run

title: Blissful staycation at Fullerton Bay Hotel
desc: Went on a solo staycation to enjoy some me time to reward myself for being a good girl. The hotel is beautiful and the staff were fantastic. Go check out the Fullerton spa too. Perfect way to chill and unwind and be a tourist in my own country.

title: Enjoyable and memorable
desc: The Fullerton Bay is a hotel that I recommend to everyone because, unlike other hotels of the same level but with thousands of rooms, you will never feel like a number but rather appreciated guests in a mansion, pampered from the first to the last moment of your living room Spacious and luxuriously furnished common areas, rooms furnished with taste and functionality, there is nothing out of place, breakfast worthy of a 5-star hotel but above all extreme professionalism and availability of all the employees who work within this structure who have made more of what they needed to do to make our stay enjoyable and memorable. Magnificent rooftop pool. The strategic location of Fullerton Bay makes it unique in Singapore. Prices appropriate to the standard.

title: Great venue for celebration
desc: We spent an evening at the Lantern rooftop bar. Loges assisted us that evening and his service was friendly and impeccable. We celebrated a 21st birthday - the hotel went above and beyond to make sure we had a great night.

title: WONDERFUL FULLERTON BAY STAY
desc: The most beautiful hotel. We are so glad we chose to celebrate our wedding anniversary here. The room was beautifully decorated, with good quality amenities and a lovely selection of teas, coffees and hot chocolate. All staff, but especially Indra at front office went above and beyond to make our stay special and memorable. We were so sad to leave. A wonderful getaway at an exquisite Singapore Hotel.

title: The most luxurious hotel stay!
desc: This is the most beautiful hotel we have been to. The service we received from all staff, particularly Indra was over and above our expectations. Our room was set up beautifully for our wedding anniversary and had everything we could need for our stay. Lovely coffee, tea and hot chocolate selections were provided and good quality bathroom amenities. What a wonderful stay! We hope to stay in the hotel again. Thank you to all the staff and a massive thanks to Indra. - Nairika and Peter

title: Expensive!
desc: Went to the rooftop bar. The staff are friendly, efficient and helpful but $22 for a pint of beer, $45 for a steak sandwich, $34 for 3 small hamburger sliders! Really? We sucked it up and enjoyed the view, had a few expensive drinks and looked at the very disappointing light show, then went elsewhere for dinner. You do get a great view.

title: Business in the CBD - A great Place to Meet.
desc: Great location and good place to meet for business and has access to great staff and views. The seating is limited, Reservations are recommended and Amex is accepted. This is great a good Executive Dining Venue, especially for Lunch.

title: best service
desc: Nesh's kind guidance was really memorable. I would like to visit again just to see him. I am deeply grateful to the hotel staff. It is a hotel that will remain in the memories of my life for the rest of my life. It's a pity that I couldn't leave the last picture with nesh. So will visit again.

title: Great to be back!
desc: Great to be back post pandemic. The service from arrival is exceptional. The view of the marina is great and the staff planned a lovely surprise for our anniversary. They took photos of us and printed this and put it in our room which was super thoughtful. Hopefully they will get the diffusers back so that we can take a little piece of Fullerton Bay home with us. The only thing that was different to the last two times we stayed is that the breakfast was not quite up to the standard it used to be. We used to get greeted personally and they noted our preferences in the past. Otherwise it was great to be back.

title: NIL
desc: the food was amazing and the staff were quick and friendly. the food was served at a comfortable timing and the staff came by to check on the customers every now and then. the ambience was lovely and the background music was relaxing and suited the atmosphere. i would come back again to have a meal.

title: Love it
desc: Excellent service Rojak chicken wings were delicious Got a complimentary cake for my bday Book at 7pm before 9 Aug to enjoy the national day rehearsal. The fireworks happens around 830pm. Conclusion book at 7pm for the best experience.

title: 1 of the Best Hotels in SIngapore
desc: Lyca and the staff were were very helpful and friendly. One of the best hotels in SIngapore. Nice sea view. Chairs and dining areas are comfortable.Near facilities and MBS shopping mall. We enjoyed our stay and decided to extend to enjoy the environment.

title: Memorable Fullerton birthday
desc: Awesome ambient with delicious dishes and excellent services. The staff people were extremely friendly, especially Alan . They were constantly checking to see if we needed anything or required any form of service.

title: Excellent Service at Lantern Rooftop Bar
desc: Thank you Najib for the excellent service! You are very friendly and patient. Food is great. The Lantern Rooftop Bar offers great views of the fireworks at Marina Bay. I will definitely support this place!

title: Best Hotel
desc: super super super good service !! I stayed here and visited Landing Point. So nice to meet beautiful korean staff Luna . We were a lot of people, but we had a good service . The food she recommended and the wine were all delicious. It was by far the best food I had in Singapore. She took a great picture of us, also. The scenery is soooo beautiful . Thank you for making happy memories . Thanks a lot for Luna , landing point staffs and fullerton hotel .

title: Perfect service and view
desc: Definitely The fullerton bay hotel . We visit Landing point to enjoy cocktails and dinner at last week . I am sure . The most beautiful view in Singapore. and we were impressed by the kind service. Especially Luna She gave lovely smile ,kind explanation and recommendation. She also gave beautiful pictures #POTD Thank you for giving me happiest memories. I will visit again.

title: cute bar!
desc: very good service !! daniel was very friendly and it was a good night for both of us :) the drinks were really good and we loved the food too. would definitely come back here ! the view is also insane

title: Staff @The Lantern, Fullerton Bay Hotel, really understand SERVICE !!
desc: My daughter, Shuying & I were at The Lantern, Fullerton Bay Hotel on 15 July'23, Sat, to catch NE3 of the National Day Parade Rehearsal. The Lantern is a cafe on the roof top of the hotel. MK is the supervisor. It didn't take us very long to see that all the staff there, under the leadership of MK, have been through proper customer service training. MK's service was especially outstanding. He served us pretty much like he was hosting his own party and we were his guests!! Warm, friendly, detailed, smiling, attentive, caring, proactive, extra-mile ... name it, every quality a well-trained service professional should have, MK has it !! He left us wanting to back to The Lantern again !! My girl was impressed enough to want a photo with MK !! A memorable Sat evening, NOT

title: Best Staycation Ever
desc: This is the best hotel we stayed so far. We were staying in the theme suite. Not only were there excellent views from the suite but also impeccable service provided by Mr Kyle Galacgac and Ms Lyca. They even assisted me with my surprise wedding proposal planning. Throughout our stay, we also received excellent service from the other hotel staff at all the different touch points.

title: the best hotel
desc: I was touched by the hospital staff's response to the guests and their kindness. I also used the lantern bar in the hotel, and a Korean employee named Dasha responded to the guests with a smile, asked them if they needed anything, and answered them kindly if they had any questions. I want to stay here when I visit Singapore next time

title: Best service
desc: The service at this restaurant is particularly good, and the food is also very delicious. I have eaten it two times in a row, and there is also a waiter who gives me a good feeling. I asked her name, Luna, and the service is particularly good. When we left 12pm, she accompanied us until 11pm, and she smiled directly, making people feel very comfortable. title: Amazing Time
desc: . We had a cast party and everyone made our experience an enjoyable one esp Julius. Julius is such an amazing person. He's attentive and such a warm person I will definitely come back and look for him. Thank you everyone in Lantern.

title: Afternoon Tea a MUST DO
desc: Went for afternoon tea on a Thursday & it was perfect! They were able to accommodate 2 vegetarian diners instead of just 1 & also provided a slice of cake for my mothers birthday. It was a great day, so good that my mother cried tears of joy.

title: Top of the line hospitality and views
desc: If you want an amazing view of Marina Bay Sands with direct access to nightly light shows, friendly staff and amazing services, Fullerton Bay is where you want to stay. Our guest relations, Lyca went above and beyond in making our stay a memorable one. We were greeted with nothing but smiles from ear to ear. Would highly recommend staying at this hotel. Thank you Lyca for making this Singapore visit an experience of a lifetime.

title: Superb service
desc: Arranged a baby shower at the landing point for a bunch of 10. The service was excellent. They accommodated all allergy requests with precision. Extremely courteous lady who was serving us. Very happy with the service. Would definitely recommend this place for a special occasion. Can‚Äôt go wrong

title: Very good
desc: Good services with Lotha ! Helpful friendly staffs. Nice places to chill and relax. Good view! Nice food ! And kids friendly. Love it ! Thank you for the nice and thoughtful responses to us. Will come again

title: Lovely relaxed spacious roof top bar
desc: Lovely spacious airy bar overlooking the Bay with view of the bay with Marina Bay Sands and its music , lights and water show . Market priced cocktails and a DJ playing a good selection of music but not a night club thumping music . Kyla hostess who served us was friendly , helpful and enthusiastic and made a lovely evening for all of us . A relaxed easy going evening with not being rushed by the staff to create room for next customers unlike other bars we went to where we were clearly told to leave in 60 mins if we were not ordering a second or third round of drinks I would go back . Thank you Kyla Lantern Hostess

title: High Tea @ Fullerton Bay Hotel

title: Celebrating anniversary

I couldnt ask for more. Just fantastic.

title: Good service
desc: I have such good experience at landing point. The high tea is excellent! The sweets are exceptional . ms Lotha service is top notch , meticulous in details. The view is also fantastic. I will come back again.

title: Amazing time at Lantern!!! Highly recommended this spot!
desc: My wife and I went to Singapore and spent a week there on vacation. It was an amazing experience! We had dinner and drinks at the Fullerton by hotel and had the most sensational time at lantern! MK was our waiter and host and the service was spectacular! We would go back again anytime we are in Singapore! Highly recommend the spot 100%! The food, the service, and the views were spectacular!

title: Memorable moment of my life
desc: You need memorable moment in Singapore? You must visit here at night. All the crews are so kind and try to make perfect night. And I will defenitly visit here again. And the manager, Daniel, really thank you for offering perfect seat and information. I enjoyed firework because you gave us information of it.

title: The Lantern rooftop bar is a great chillout place
desc: Visited The Lantern on 10 July 2023 and enjoyed snacks and cocktails with a great view of the sunset over Marina Bay. The rooftop bar is great and the service is friendly and professional. Daniel our waiter took good care of us and like the other guests we all had a nice relaxing evening.

title: It‚Äôs worth it!
desc: The Fullerton Bay always delivers! Amazing personalized customer service, huge spacious rooms, fab and cool roof top pool and bar - all just so worth it! We keep coming back and we‚Äôll come back again‚Ä¶‚Ä¶and again.

title: Awesome food and service. Highly recommended.
